title: Could the Spanish Grand Prix be another Mercedes disaster?
description: Sky-high temperatures and F1 politics. Alexis Nunes and Laurence Edmondson preview the Spanish Grand Prix and its many dramas in the Racing Point saga, the Concorde agreement and the pair take a look at some of your Pit Stop Predictions.
itunes:title: Could the Spanish Grand Prix be another Mercedes disaster?
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Sky-high temperatures and F1 politics. Previewing the Spanish GP and its many dramas in the Racing Point saga, the Concorde agreement & more all on the ESPN F1 Podcast.
itunes:summary: Sky-high temperatures and F1 politics. Alexis Nunes and Laurence Edmondson preview the Spanish Grand Prix and its many dramas in the Racing Point saga, the Concorde agreement and the pair take a look at some of your Pit Stop Predictions.
